quote: Even though people may be well known, they hold in their hearts the emotions of a simple person for the moments that are the most important of those we know on earth: birth, marriage and death.
quote_letters: EVEN THOUGH PEOPLE MAY BE WELL KNOWN THEY HOLD IN THEIR HEARTS THE EMOTIONS OF A SIMPLE PERSON FOR THE MOMENTS THAT ARE THE MOST IMPORTANT OF THOSE WE KNOW ON EARTH BIRTH MARRIAGE AND DEATH
